# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(bairstow LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(bairstow STATIC "")
set_target_properties(bairstow PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "bairstow")
set_target_properties(bairstow PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(bairstow PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(bairstow INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(bairstow PRIVATE
    /home/lubuntu/.conan/data/ms-gsl/3.1.0/_/_/package/5ab84d6acfe1f23c4fae0ab88f26e3a396351ac9/include
)
target_compile_options(bairstow PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(bairstow PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(bairstow PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET bairstow PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(bairstow PRIVATE
    pthread
)
target_sources(bairstow PRIVATE
    src/rootfinding.cpp
    src/autocorr.cpp
    src/aberth.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(test "")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "test")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_dependencies(test bairstow)
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(test INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    /home/lubuntu/.config/.xmake/packages/f/fmt/8.1.1/212ea05ee1514fb8bc1d6d9f35de8988/include
    /home/lubuntu/.conan/data/ms-gsl/3.1.0/_/_/package/5ab84d6acfe1f23c4fae0ab88f26e3a396351ac9/include
    /home/lubuntu/.conan/data/doctest/2.4.8/_/_/package/5ab84d6acfe1f23c4fae0ab88f26e3a396351ac9/include
)
target_compile_options(test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
    fmt
    bairstow
    pthread
)
target_link_directories(test PRIVATE
    /home/lubuntu/.config/.xmake/packages/f/fmt/8.1.1/212ea05ee1514fb8bc1d6d9f35de8988/lib
    /home/lubuntu/.conan/data/doctest/2.4.8/_/_/package/5ab84d6acfe1f23c4fae0ab88f26e3a396351ac9/lib
    build/linux/x86_64/release
)
target_link_options(test PRIVATE
    -m64
    -lpthread
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    tests/test_aberth.cpp
    tests/test_main.cpp
    tests/test_autocorr.cpp
    tests/test_fir.cpp
    tests/test_rootfinding.cpp
)
